description: Application for a non material amendment (S96a) in relation to planning application ref; PP/2015/3774 for Variation of condition 2 (Approved Plans) of planning permission ref :PP/2014/2254 dated 03/06/2014 for erection of a new 80-bed, one, two and three-storey Medium Secure Unit building following the demolition of the existing John Conolly Wing building and the pedestrian bridge link to Ealing Hospital; minor external alterations to the Three Bridges Regional Secure Unit and Wells Unit  (including demolition of external walkway); provision of new foul sewage pumping station; erection of 5.2 metre high secure fencing to eastern part of the site; provision of single storey horticultural unit building; provision of new Multi-Use Games Area (MUGA), landscaping works and creation of therapy gardens; and creation of associated car and cycle parking. - Variation of conditions 2 and 12 of original permission to formalise the reduction in car parking spaces and electrical vehicle charging points at the new Medium Secure Unit development (Substitution of approved drawing related to the horticultural unit). Amendment seeks the retention of the glazed walkway on the north elevation, Additional caged fencing to the north elevation associated with the retention of the glazed walkway and alterations to the planting plan for the removal of an additional tree
